alert.note: Alert for Eastern Kiowa County; Leadville Vicinity, Lake County Below 11000 Ft; Pikes Peak above 11000 Ft; Teller County, Rampart Range above 7500fT, Pike's Peak Between 7500 And 11000 Ft; Western Kiowa County; Western Mosquito Range, East Lake County Above 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 18 at 3:52AM MST until January 18 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow and some freezing drizzle over Kiowa county. Additional snow accumulations of up to 3 inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...sections of southeast and south central Colorado * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
